pages.text: 37|25|Nimen zenme bu huzhu ne?
37|26|Buran! Tamen zai jinri shi guishun de.
37|27|Yushi tamen dajia zouxiang qian lai, huxiang tanlun,
37|28|zhexie ren shuo:“Nimen que yi yong quanli xiepo women.”
37|29|Naxie ren shuo:“Buran! Nimen ziji yuanlai bu shi xindao zhe,
37|30|women dui nimen jue wu quanli. Buran! Nimen shi beini de minzhong.
37|31|Gu women yingdang shou women de zhu de panjue, women que shi changshi de.
37|32|Suo yi women shi nimen mi wu, women ziji ye queshi shi mi wu de.”
37|33|Zai na ri, tamen biding tong shou xingfa.
37|34|Wo biding zheyang duidai fanzui zhe.
37|35|Tamen que shi zheyang de: Youren dui tamen shuo:“Chu an la wai, jue wu ying shou chongbai de,” tamen jiu wang zizun da,
37|36|bingqie shuo:“Nandao women wubi yao wei yige kuangwang de shiren, er paoqi women de zhong shenling ma?”
37|37|Buran! Ta zhaoshile zhenli, bing zhengshile lidai de shizhe.
37|38|Nimen biding changshi tongku de xingfa,
37|39|nimen zhi yi ziji de xingwei er shou baochou.
37|40|Wei an la de qiancheng de zhong pu,
37|41|jiang xiangshou yi zhong kezhi de jiyang——
37|42|ge zhong shuiguo, tongshi tamen shi shou youdai de;
37|43|tamen zai enze de leyuan zhong,
37|44|tamen zuo zai chuangshang, bici xiangdui;
37|45|youren yi beizi zai tamen zhi jian ai ci chuandi, bei zhong man sheng liquan,
37|46|yanse jiebai, yin zhe wubu cheng wei meiwei;
37|47|liquan zhong wu mazui wu, tamen ye bu yin ta er mingding;
37|48|tamen jiang you bushi feili de, mei mudi banlu,
37|49|tamen fangfu bei zhencang de tuo luan yang;
37|50|yushi tamen zouxiang qian lai, huxiang tanlun.
37|51|Tamen zhong youyigeren shuo:“Wo you yi ge pengyou,
